import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "tailwindcss/tailwind.css"; const Account = () => { const [companies, setCompanies] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:3000/company") .then((response) => { setCompanies(response.data); }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); }, []); return ( {companies.map((company) => ( ))}
Email Téléphone Nom de l'entreprise Nom de formation Message Code Actions
{company.email}
{company.phone}
{company.companyname}
{company.trainingcourse}
{company.message}
); }; export default Account;
